Infectra



*Infectra looks at Airbomber*


Infectra: "I'm afraid I'm going=
 to get slagged just like that. and no one get mad. I'm not doubting any of=
 you. But, there is a chance we could end up out numbered tough. You probab=
ly think I'm being silly and dumb."


*Infectra says to Airbomber*

  -----=
 Original Message ----- 
  From: THECODE 
  To: nbwrpg@egroups.com 
  Sent:=
 Wednesday, August 23, 2000 1:05 AM
  Subject: Airbomber...


  Airbomber s=
een the fear in Infectra's eyes.

  "Why are you afraid?" Airbomber asked h=
er...
    ----- Original Message ----- 
    From: ilovealllizards 
    To: =
nbwrpg@egroups.com 
    Sent: Wednesday, August 23, 2000 12:25 AM
    Subje=
ct: Re: Doom Ice...


    Infectra


    *Infectra frowns. She really didn'=
t know anything about this or what to do but her heart took gained force ov=
er her brain where she only thought about her love for Airbomber and didn't=
 want to lose him. She slowly walks over feeling a bit scared but raises he=
r hands in air with the others but still felt scared*

      ----- Original=
 Message ----- 
      From: THECODE 
      To: nbwrpg@egroups.com 
      Se=
nt: Wednesday, August 23, 2000 12:05 AM
      Subject: Doom Ice...


      =
A satsis pod falls in front of the Maximals base. At the same time, Deemos =
and his group are repaired and come from the CR Chamber, their wounds were =
fatal but not major. The 6 of them sport a different paint job, all 6 of th=
em are purple, black, and white now. Deemos and his group go outside and se=
e the pod. Deemos gives the thumbs up to His comrades. They start to progra=
m it.

      "Name?" Deemos asked.

      "It says the name is...Tint." Riz=
opas says. Deemos's smile is huge.

      "Make the name Doom Ice, you can =
do that, if she was dumb enough to escape in a stasis pod, we reprogram her=
!" Deemos said.

      "Isn't that what we are against?" Artist asked.

   =
   "No, Artist, it's not, we are just trying to make more bots good!" Deemo=
s replied. Airbomber walks up and sees the pod.

      "What are you guys d=
oing with the pod?" He asked. Suddenly, every one of Deemos' group members =
had a blaster stuck in Airbomber's face.

      "I say we kill him!" Blende=
r said.

      "I say we make him join us in our fight!" Diskus said.

    =
  "For once your intelligent, Diskus!" Stronghold said. Airbomber is sweati=
ng now, he didn't know what that meant but it scared him. Deemos came up fr=
om behind him. (Don't know if Infectra is there, but I assume she is, if sh=
e's not then tell me) Stronghold and Blender target Infectra. Deemos starts=
 to pump some phony info into his mind with the device, and bam! He already=
 looks serious.

      "Infectra, you might as well leave." Deemos said.

 =
     "I will join you, you guys are right, we do need less violence, the wa=
r must end, and if there must be a war to end the war, so be it!" Airbomber=
 said. He turns back to Infectra.

      "Do not worry, Infectra, I still l=
ove you, you don't have to leave." Airbomber said. Deemos laughed and rubbe=
d his hands together as Rizopas reprograms Tint and makes her Doom Ice. Doo=
m Ice is first seen now, she stands and looks around. Deemos is in a new fo=
rm, but she reconizes him. But, she has no fear, he seems different. She kn=
ew of their war, she didn't know how, but she knew. (Reprogrammed and memor=
y addage while she was asleep)

      "I shall join you." Doom Ice said. De=
emos looked at his growing group, A few more and he'll rule the Neo Beast W=
ars! It's a sure thing! He thought. He had 8 now, and it felt pretty good. =
Doom Ice didn't remember Land Mine a single bit, and remembered Deemos as y=
our lord and almighty leader.

      "For the Maximals, and everyone's prot=
ection and peace! Until all...are one!" Deemos shouted. Doom Ice and Airbom=
ber's hands were raised and the 8 of them raised their hands high in the ai=
r. Airbomber waved for Infectra to do it to, not caring about what she thou=
ght of this group...
